description:
Kite’s fate was sealed the moment he laid hands on those upperclassmen. Good thing Sora has never been one to give up without a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kite, His Ball, and the Team`s Pain
La souffrance de Toby et de l’équipe
Milan, der Ball und der Schmerz des Teams
Tobi to Hall to Nakama no Itami
鳶とボールと仲間の痛み
